name: Maze Time V0.5
description:
This is a new idea for a game I had, that involves a guy going though his boring life, and every so often, he suddenly encounters a mischievous being that forces him to do a maze, these mazes which get increasingly harder, going from very very easy and quickly escalating to hard.

Controls:

WASD/Arrow Keys - Movement

Enter Key - Continue Dialog

Made by the Bitsy Game Maker

https://ledoux.itch.io/bitsy

V0.5 Includes:

-1  2-part  Maze (5 in total)

-2 more characters to interact with (8 in total)

-3 more items to collect (17 in total)
